]

- Confidence level: High

- "How does your fatigue compare to your normal level? Are you able to do your usual activities?" (assesses baseline and potential minimization)

- Priority order: First, clarify the timeline and progression, as understanding whether symptoms are worsening can differentiate between benign and serious causes. Next, explore other associated symptoms to assess overall clinical suspicion. Finally, reassure and contextualize fears, emphasizing that further evaluation will help determine severity accurately.

  "DOCTOR: Can you tell me if you've noticed any other changes like chills, night sweats, weight loss, or feeling unusually tired or weak beyond your fever and chest pain?",
